outro_text.eng:
Most parts of a child’s day are dictated by the rules and plans of adults.

As adults, we lead the way for our children in terms of most of their activities. Children have very little say. Most adults struggle when they feel they don’t have a say or aren’t in control. Children are the same.

rows.outro_text:
Most parts of a child’s day are dictated by the rules and plans of adults.

As adults, we lead the way for our children in terms of most of their activities. Children have very little say. Most adults struggle when they feel they don’t have a say or aren’t in control. Children are the same.

outro_text.eng: A great way to make your child feel seen, valued, important, is making time to join them in their world, and to let them take the lead during one-on-one time.

rows.outro_text: A great way to make your child feel seen, valued, important, is making time to join them in their world, and to let them take the lead during one-on-one time.

outro_text.eng:
It is not about keeping track of a child’s behaviour to make sure they are behaving properly. It’s not about teaching them to do something or educating them.

It is a way to bond, connect, and have a positive experience with your child. It is a way for you to escape your world and join your child in their world.

rows.outro_text:
It is not about keeping track of a child’s behaviour to make sure they are behaving properly. It’s not about teaching them to do something or educating them.

It is a way to bond, connect, and have a positive experience with your child. It is a way for you to escape your world and join your child in their world.
